title: Blurry text in game
body:
Hello guys!

Had a break of LoL for about 2 years now. Patched it and when I get in game all the menu/shop texts are blurry but the other graphic is as it's supposed to be. Tried googeling without any luck! Can't read stuff like what items do or nothing..

Need some help to resolve this problem!

It's the loading screen, chat, in game shop etc.

replies.body:
This typically happens on Intel chipsets and should be resolved by going into your Intel Graphics control panel and ensuring your settings are set to **QUALITY** over **PERFORMANCE**. I've provided a stock screenshot so you know what the application looks like.

https://www.howtogeek.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/11/intel-graphics-change-3d-settings.png

Please let me know if this resolved your issue.
